content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつ、迷惑だなあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That guy is such a nuisance."},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"音もなくバスワルドが","translatedEnglishLine":"Buswald silently"},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスへと視線を向ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"turned his gaze towards Rance."},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、こっち見てる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, he's looking this way."},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我は破壊を司る神、バスワルド」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am Buswald, the god who governs destruction."},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"「世界に破滅が近づいた時、","translatedEnglishLine":"When doom approaches the world,"},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"　破滅を防ぐ為に、世界を破壊する者」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am the one who destroys the world to prevent destruction."},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我を我にし、","translatedEnglishLine":"The one who called me to be myself,"},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"　呼び出したのは貴様か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"was it you?"},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、違うぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, that's not it."},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"「入ったらお前もうその姿だったぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You were already in that form when you entered."},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんで自分がその姿になってるのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't you even understand why you look like that?"},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もしかして自分で分かってないのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be that you don't know yourself?"},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、どじっこさん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you a clumsy person?"},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピカー。","translatedEnglishLine":"*Flash*."},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"バスワルドが光りだし――","translatedEnglishLine":"Buswald began to shine—"},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"ポンッ。","translatedEnglishLine":"*Pop*."},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルとサイゼルの二人に戻った。","translatedEnglishLine":"They returned to being Hauzel and Saizel, the two of them."},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ〜……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah..."},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"　また合体しちゃってたのか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We ended up combining again, huh..."},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う〜ん……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも、なんでまた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But why again..."},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ようやく元に戻ったか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Finally, we're back to normal."},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Kya..."},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　す、すみません、総統……","translatedEnglishLine":"S-sorry, Commander..."},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ご迷惑を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"For causing trouble..."},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、ちょっと！","translatedEnglishLine":"H-hey! "},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見るんじゃないわよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't look!"},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君達いったい何してたんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What exactly were you two doing?"},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なにって……","translatedEnglishLine":"W-what...?"},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二人だけだったから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it was just the two of us,"},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっと遊んでただけよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"we were just playing a little."},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「遊び？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Playing?"},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、水温変える遊び」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yeah, playing with changing the water temperature."},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ〜……","translatedEnglishLine":"Phew..."},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいお湯ね、ハウゼル」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nice hot water, Hauzel."},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうねぇ、姉さん」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, sis."},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"姉妹が二人でまったりと温泉を楽しんでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two sisters were leisurely enjoying the hot springs together."},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんっ、姉さん、水温がぬるくなってる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, sis, the water's gotten lukewarm."},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、勝手に力漏れちゃってたかしら。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh dear, did my power leak out on its own?"},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、いいんじゃない？　これくらいで」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, isn't it fine like this?"},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目よ、後で入る人達が困るわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, the people who come in later will be troubled."},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"　んしょ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Here we go."},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ、熱くなってきた」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kya, it's getting hot!"},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やったわねぇ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You did it!"},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えいえいっ、えいえいっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heave ho, heave ho!"},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、きゃっ、ふふ、駄目よ姉さん","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, kya, hehe, no, sis,"},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今度は冷たくなりすぎよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"now it's too cold."},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイゼルは冷たく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel made it cold,"},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルは熱く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauzel made it hot."},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"炎と氷の力を互いに行使して、","translatedEnglishLine":"They used the powers of fire and ice against each other,"},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"水温を変えていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"changing the water temperature."},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは互いの力が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Their powers,"},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"丁度打ち消し合うような力で。","translatedEnglishLine":"were exactly the kind that canceled each other out."},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"などとしていると――","translatedEnglishLine":"As they continued playing—"}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That guy is such a nuisance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 音もなくバスワルドが
ランスへと視線を向ける。
「我は破壊を司る神、バスワルド」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Buswald, the god who governs destruction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破滅を防ぐ為に、世界を破壊する者」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the one who destroys the world to prevent destruction.
The one who called me to be myself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼び出したのは貴様か？」
「入ったらお前もうその姿だったぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were already in that form when you entered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんで自分がその姿になってるのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't you even understand why you look like that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして自分で分かってないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be that you don't know yourself?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バスワルドが光りだし――
ハウゼルとサイゼルの二人に戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They returned to being Hauzel and Saizel, the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また合体しちゃってたのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We ended up combining again, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君達いったい何してたんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What exactly were you two doing?
Since it was just the two of us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと遊んでただけよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we were just playing a little.
Y-yeah, playing with changing the water temperature.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉妹が二人でまったりと温泉を楽しんでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two sisters were leisurely enjoying the hot springs together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんっ、姉さん、水温がぬるくなってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, sis, the water's gotten lukewarm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、勝手に力漏れちゃってたかしら。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh dear, did my power leak out on its own?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、いいんじゃない？　これくらいで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, isn't it fine like this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目よ、後で入る人達が困るわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, the people who come in later will be troubled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えいえいっ、えいえいっ」
「あ、きゃっ、ふふ、駄目よ姉さん
今度は冷たくなりすぎよ」
炎と氷の力を互いに行使して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They used the powers of fire and ice against each other,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 丁度打ち消し合うような力で。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were exactly the kind that canceled each other out.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

ランスへと視線を向ける。
「我は破壊を司る神、バスワルド」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Buswald, the god who governs destruction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破滅を防ぐ為に、世界を破壊する者」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the one who destroys the world to prevent destruction.
The one who called me to be myself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼び出したのは貴様か？」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんで自分がその姿になってるのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't you even understand why you look like that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして自分で分かってないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be that you don't know yourself?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バスワルドが光りだし――
ハウゼルとサイゼルの二人に戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They returned to being Hauzel and Saizel, the two of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また合体しちゃってたのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We ended up combining again, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君達いったい何してたんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What exactly were you two doing?
Since it was just the two of us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと遊んでただけよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we were just playing a little.
Y-yeah, playing with changing the water temperature.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two sisters were leisurely enjoying the hot springs together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんっ、姉さん、水温がぬるくなってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, sis, the water's gotten lukewarm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、勝手に力漏れちゃってたかしら。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh dear, did my power leak out on its own?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、いいんじゃない？　これくらいで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, isn't it fine like this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目よ、後で入る人達が困るわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, the people who come in later will be troubled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えいえいっ、えいえいっ」

今度は冷たくなりすぎよ」
炎と氷の力を互いに行使して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They used the powers of fire and ice against each other,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 丁度打ち消し合うような力で。
